data.description:
Welcome to the VR Church devotionals application. Read the bible in calm natural environments, go on journeys through the psalms and beatitudes in the gardens of Esperanza. Whether you want to worship, pray or just relax, there are experiences for you in VR Church.

Welcome to the VR Church application. Listen to meditative Bible verses from the World English Bible or read the Bible in calm natural environments, go on journeys through the psalms and beatitudes in the gardens of Esperanza. Whether you want to worship, pray or just relax, there are experiences for you in VR Church.

News:
New meditative bible readings are available for Isaiah 9 and Romans 8. Spanish and KJV translations of the Bible are now available in the reading section of the app.

changelog.change_log: Updated to reading plans to fix missing bible verses issue

Bug fixes to inactive hide ui buttons
Minor graphical tweaks
Added analytics to help understand usage trends
Fresh new user interface introduces meditative bible readings alongside the original bible application
Updated SDKs to improve device compatibility
Upgraded 3rd party libraries for performance and bug fixes for S8 users

Spanish + KJV translations added for Bible Readings. Experimental controller support, service times and music scene menus added.Spanish + KJV translations added. Experimental controller support, service times and music scene menus added.

Massive Update: Complete overhaul of the UI system, daily reading plans and the first ever publishing of the whole bible in VR. Much of the feedback from your reviews has been taken onboard and the new update is here as an answer to that feedback.

Massive Update: Complete overhaul of the UI system, daily reading plans and the first ever publishing of the whole bible in VR. Much of the feedback from your reviews has been taken onboard and the new update is here as an answer to that feedback.
Update with new intro video and new music
Major update including a new Beatitudes experience
Performance Improvments, Analytics Update and Mention to Virtual Church Experience on Altspace VR
